name: Andrea Castro, PhD
bio: Andrea recently obtained her Ph.D. in Bioinformatics and Systems Biology at UCSD. Her research involves investigating the relationship between patient genetic diversity in the immune system and tumor evolution; leveraging large-scale genomic, transcriptomic, and proteomic datasets to learn more about immune surveillance and selection on tumors.
education: PhD in Bioinformatics and Systems Biology, 2022UC San Diego
MS in Computer Science, 2021UC San Diego
BS in Microbiology Immunology and Molecular Genetics, 2017UCLA
